_json.gridTitle: How to Make Ikea Ritva Curtains Look Like Expensive Custom Made Drapes DIY
_json.description: You don’t have to spend a fortune on custom drapes…I’ll show you how to make ready-made Ikea Ritva curtains look like expensive custom drapes. I think beautifully designed and created drapes(window treatments) are second only to good lighting in a well designed space.  Step 1. Cut the Ritva to the proper length for your window. Hang your curtain rod, including the rings. Measure from the bottom of the rings to the floor…this is the finished length of your drapes. …
